text: Kudos #MaryWashingtonHospital 4 fantastic #COVID19 #vaccine distro. People are sent a link for appt., sit in vehicle until sent text to enter bldg, move briskly, get vaccine, 2nd appt., wait 15 mins & go. Nice people too! #SundayThoughts #SundayMorning #SundayMotivation https://t.co/PxSjkpgpIE
